snippet: After the board of the Riverdale Jewish Center decided not to seek the removal of Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt, at least two board trustees resigned.
abstract: Board of Riverdale Jewish Center in Bronx says Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt will be allowed to remain in his position, after complaints were made about his decision to take boys naked to sauna; Rosenblatt seems to have support of 700-member congregation, but two board members resign because of decision and some in congregation have started holding services in their homes.
lead_paragraph: After the board of the Riverdale Jewish Center decided not to seek the removal of Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt, at least two board trustees resigned.

headline.main: Bronx Rabbi Who Took Boys Naked to Sauna Will Keep His Job
headline.print_headline: Bronx Rabbi Who Held Sauna Chats Will Keep Job
